titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation requiring the members of both Houses of Parliament to attend at the time prefixed by the prorogation being the seventh day of January next.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the tenth day of December, 1673, in the five and twentieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
